item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 13 Jan 2026
item.description:
1. camlid: A library for building C stub generators
  2. restricted 1.1 - Restrict possible system operations and filesystem view of your program
  3. OCaml Security Team 2025 End-Of-Year Report
  4. Lwt.6.0.0 release (direct-style, tracing)
  5. Other OCaml News
